pkgmetadata.longdescription: Betas-Select in Structural Equation Models and Linear Models // It computes betas-select, coefficients after standardization in structural equation models and regression models, standardizing only selected variables. Supports models with moderation, with product terms formed after standardization. It also offers confidence intervals that account for standardization, including bootstrap confidence intervals as proposed by Cheung et al. (2022) doi:10.1037/hea0001188.
